query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS app_users (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('user', 'admin') DEFAULT 'user' NOT NULL,
  active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2RJ6pkiYcWrkG7s.7677514b54b3 --database AdJ4NUusdiWEA7xpHs45nc --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS app_users (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('user', 'admin') DEFAULT 'user' NOT NULL,
  active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
